Tip: start time and end time is the bracelet to perform a self-determined heart rate function time period, the frequency refers to the bracelet in the specified time range every frequency time to monitor the heart rate value.
a maximum of 5 alarm clock can be open
Go to Settings - Bluetooth search to connect(disconnect) to a Bluetooth device!
Updating to firmware version for you
It has been updated to firmware version
Firmware upgrade failed, please re-connect device upgrade
It is necessary to open the auxiliary service function to prevent some mobile phones from receiving the message push
The distance setting target has been completed
The target of the time setting is complete
The target of the calorie setting has been completed
The message notification service is running

Note: do not turn off the APP during the upgrade, so that the bracelet and the phone remain in the effective Bluetooth distance, and if the upgrade fails, the device name will become DfuTargXXX, please reconnect the device, upgrade again
There is a firmware that has not been upgraded. Please continue upgrading！
Please open the permissions of the camera,Then let the device re enter the camera
You can also enable devices to support voice transmission
Such as: Bluetooth call, Bluetooth music and other functions.
1. view the device name that has been bound, the device name, the Bluetooth name.
2. connection: enter system settings - Bluetooth search device, find the same name device, click on the connection.
3. break: enter system settings - Bluetooth - paired devices, find the same name device, enter the click Cancel pairing, remove the pairing relationship.
This function is not supported for the time being

Because the mobile phone system is special, you need to turn off the notification switch and turn on again

or wait a few seconds to search again
or restart the system under the Bluetooth。

Version checking failed. Please try again later
Need to add Fundo to the list of battery optimizations\n\n
Please click OK. In the pop-up "ignore battery optimization" dialog box, choose "yes".
After setting a provincial whitelist, a stable connection between Fundo and the device Bluetooth can be maintained.\n\n
Please click OK, in the ejection setting, choose "unrestricted", and choose "allow location".
Need to be added to the start list\n\n
Please click OK. In the pop-up "self start management", the corresponding switch is opened.
You need to add Fundo to the lock screen to clean up the white list\n\n
Please click "confirm", in the pop-up "lock screen cleaning" list, set the Fundo corresponding switch.
Need to set up Fundo power saving options\n\n
Please click OK to set the options in the "power saving" page that pops up.
Fundo power consumption switch needs to be shut down\n\n

Please click OK. In the battery page that pops out, click on the power consumption protection and turn off the corresponding switch. \n\n note: please do not repeat the change of power consumption to protect the status of the corresponding switch. Repeatedly modifying the switch state will cause APP to restart. If you need to repeat the switch state, you can quit APP and set up the battery entries in the phone settings page.
You need to allow Fundo to run in the background\n\n
Please click OK to turn on the Fundo corresponding switch in the pop-up "high power consumption".
Need to set up Fundo memory blank list\n\n
Please click OK to open the Fundo corresponding switch in the "accelerated white list" of the pop-up.
You need to add Fundo for protected applications\n\n
Please click OK to open the Fundo corresponding switch in the "application protection" pop-up.
Please click OK to change the split "backstage management" option to "allow backstage operation" in the pop-up rights management interface.
Motion distance is too short to automatically save data
Your mobile phone does not support HID connections
Please confirm request of the hand calibration for the watch

Tip: Please set time of "hour hand" and "minute hand" time according to the current positions of the watch hands. Determine the time of "second hand" according to the running rule of the minute hand jumping one time every 20 seconds.
The black eye bags of the siege lions have landed on the ground
Note: Do not close the APP during the upgrade process to keep the bracelet and the mobile phone within a valid Bluetooth distance. If the upgrade fails, reconnect the device and upgrade again.

Operation instructions:
 Step 1: Open personal WeChat/Alipay, find the QR code and save it. 
 The second step is to add the receipt QR code image to the branch app and save it. 
 Step 3: Check the results of smart watch receiver QR code display.

Turn on ECG detection in the wearable device feature list\nTouch the electrode piece as shown in the above figure\nYou can detect your ECG
I can't detect your ECG\nPlease press the electrode on the device

点击穿戴设备中的体温检测功能\n保持以上动作5秒即可记录你当前的体温

设备无法收到App的消息提醒？
 请执行以下步骤：
 1.Fundo与设备要保持蓝牙连接
 2.Fundo内，更多-应用推送-把分动开关关掉，再重新打开
 3.Fundo内，来电通知和短信通知开关关掉，再重新打开
 4.手机设置-更多设置-辅助功能（部分手机为无障碍）-Fundo-把Fundo的开关打开
 5.手机设置-权限管理理-Fundo-把Fundo的权限全部设置为允许
 6.手机设置-通知栏与状态栏-Fundo-把Fundo的通知开关全部打开
 Noto：
 因安卓系统之间存在差异，具体路径以实际手机为准
